channel.title: Making a player start with items [PI]
channel.description: Yeah i know this is a noob question but i've checked other sources and in the config.java and server.java and client.java but i cant find out where i would put this. any help goes well appreciated.

item.title: Making a player start with items [PI]
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

playerassistant.java

look for the method public void addstarter, if you can’t find it, add this

public void addStarter() { c.trade11 = 1200; c.getItems().addItem(995,1000000); c.getItems().addItem(1321,1); c.getItems().addItem(1322,1); c.getItems().addItem(1323,1); c.getItems().addItem(1323,1); c.getItems().addItem(5,1); c.sendMessage("Please register on forums Myth-Scape.com"); c.sendMessage("If you drop an item it will disappear for ever!"); c.sendMessage("Also you wont lose any items from dying within 15 minutes."); c.getPA().showInterface(3559); c.canChangeAppearance = true; }

Read full topic
item.source: Making a player start with items [PI]
